text: Haegiela is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family described as a genus in 1990.Short, Philip Sydney & Wilson, Paul Graham. 1990. Muelleria 7(2): 259Tropicos, Haegiela P. S. Short & Paul G. Wilson There is only one known species, Haegiela tatei, native to South Australia. ==References== Category:Monotypic Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of South Australia Category:Taxa named by Paul G. Wilson Category:Taxa named by Philip Sydney Short
title: Haegiela
